description: This table extracts the related multiple response Task Log: Added Task Instances (I LTK 81917) item.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: OUTREACH_CSN_ID
columns.description: A list of RCH contacts representing the task instances that were added to the list of active instances as a result of this task action.
